definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: She nursed her husband back to health.
sentences.chinese: 她精心照料丈夫，直到他康復。

sentences.english: With careful planning, stages can even be interleaved.
sentences.chinese: 經過精心計劃，階段之間甚至可以交錯。

sentences.english: The demonstration was carefully orchestrated to attract maximum publicity.
sentences.chinese: 該示威經過精心策畫以儘量吸引公衆注重。

sentences.english: Wally was now out of danger and removed from intensive care.
sentences.chinese: 沃利已經脫離危險，不再需要精心護理。

sentences.english: The whole meeting was an elaborately staged act of misdirection.
sentences.chinese: 整個會面就是一場精心安排的誤導破案的表演。

sentences.english: Look at that slightly stubbly chin.
sentences.chinese: 看那下巴上精心修過的鬍渣。

sentences.english: I carefully prepared a second model class, finally got the recognition.
sentences.chinese: 但我精心準備了第二次示範課，這次終於得到了表揚。

sentences.english: Your mother prefers to do her own housekeeping -- even if it is a little slapdash.
sentences.chinese: 即便有點精心馬虎了，你母親還是更喜歡自己做家務。

sentences.english: Was it possible that the plaintiffs had colluded with Beristain to handpick the interviewees?
sentences.chinese: 是否有可能是原告勾結貝斯坦並精心挑選了受訪者？

sentences.english: Permit me first of all to thank you, our host for your extraordinary arrangements and warm hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請允許我感謝主辦方的精心安排和盛情款待。

sentences.english: The Corpus Juris was the product of a careful process of selection and rejection.
sentences.chinese: 《國法大全》是一部經過精心篩選的作品。

sentences.english: Elaborate funeral cars stood along the curb.
sentences.chinese: 精心裝飾的出殯汽車沿街排列著。

sentences.english: Bathroom shows the ingenuity of the designer, with separate bath and shower to meet different needs.
sentences.chinese: 客房內精心設計的浴室還擁有獨立的衝淋和盆浴區域。

sentences.english: All three textures were carefully made in a photorealistic style.
sentences.chinese: 所有這三個紋理被精心製作的照片風格。

sentences.english: As to animals, they are always inoculated in time and kept according to the certain rules.
sentences.chinese: 這些動物們都被及時接種過疫苗並被精心飼養。

sentences.english: But the flower was not satisfied to complete the preparations for her beauty in the shelter of her green chamber.
sentences.chinese: 可是，花兒並不滿足於藏在綠房裏精心打扮。

definition: to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking/at the cost of a lot of effort
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to take sb's measurements/to measure sb up
to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality/to adopt an original approach
